title: omh_header
description: This schema represents the header of a data transaction.

id.description: The identifier of this data point. We strongly recommend this to be a globally unique value.

creation_date_time.description: The date time this data point was created on the system where data is stored.

schema_id.description: The schema identifier of the body of the data point.

source_name.description: The name of the source of the data.

source_data_point_id.description: The identifier of this data point at the source (immediately preceding step).

source_creation_date_time.description: The date time (timestamp) of data creation at the source.

source_last_modification_date_time.description: The date time (timestamp) of last data modification at the source.

modality.description: The modality whereby the measure is obtained.

user_id.description: The user this data point belongs to.
